Role(s) : Upper Elementary Teacher (3rd+);Middle School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : My interests outside of teaching or the school environment are : Hunting, fishing, camping, fitness, reading, health. 

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* As an intermidiate educator teaching 5th grade ELA in a modified middle school , the facilitator of our Digital News Club and chair of our family and community engagement I feel that being a part of this program could benefit me in many ways,  As an educator increasing my own knowledge of STEM careers could help me inspire students , learning about different technologies could benefit the different committees and clubs at our school to increase student, famiy and community engagement.
